admin.title: Notify
admin.description: Manage your notifications to Slack, Hipchat and Gitter.

services.title: Notification services
services.description: Choose which services should be notified when there is something to notify you about.
services.unavailable: This connector is currently not available; if you want to use it, please follow the installation instructions.

events.title: Notification events

slack-modal.title: Slack settings
slack-modal.description: In order to obtain the token, visit https://api.slack.com/web

hipchat-modal.title: HipChat settings
hipchat-modal.description: To obtain the token, visit your the room settings over at hipchat.com (Login, click on `rooms` and select your the room you want to post to). Click on `Tokens` and create a new one. The label you provide for the token will be shown with each notification.
hipchat-modal.room: Room to post to (name or id)
hipchat-modal.warning: Notify does not work with self-hosted HipChat.

gitter-modal.title: Gitter settings
gitter-modal.description: In order to get your webhook url, visit the room you want to post to on gitter.im. Click on the Settings icon Integrations Custom. This will create a new webhook url for you.

telegram-modal.title: Telegram settings
telegram-modal.description: In order to set up your bot, follow the <aBot>instructions</aBot>. Then <aChatId>obtain a chat ID</aChatId>.
